description: Avalanche (Dominikos Ioannis Petrakis) is a fictional character, a mutant supervillain and an enemy of the X-Men.A Cretan mutant, Avalanche possesses the ability to generate seismic waves from his hands that are strong enough to create earthquakes of varying sizes and to disintegrate any substance other than living tissue. He has been a member of the Brotherhood of Mutants and Freedom Force.The animated series X-Men: Evolution portrays him as Lance Alvers, a misguided mutant teenager and one time romantic love interest of the X-Men's Shadowcat.
name: Avalanche
powers: Geological manipulation via seismic wave generation from his hands.
